title: Employee Attrition Prediction with Python
description: In this article, I’ll introduce you to a machine learning project on employee attrition prediction with Python programming language. Employees are considered the backbone of an organization. The success or failure of the organization depends on the employees who work for an organization. Organizations must deal with the problems when trained, skilled and experienced employees leave the organization for better opportunities.
